info.sourceTextContent: ¿Pero cuándo no hubo o cuándo dejará de haber caciques, aunque con otro nombre o apodo los designemos? Desde antes que Cadmo aportase a Grecia, y desde antes que Saturno reinase en Italia, en Grecia y en Italia hubo caciques.
info.suspiciousTextContent: But when there wasn't any or when there would not be any more chiefs, will we refer to them even with a different name of nickname? Since before Cadmo relocated to Greece, and before Saturn reigned in Italy, in Greece and in Italy there were chiefs
